xml.name: Create function from function type
xml.Text: GoLand can create functions and methods from a call. But now, if you are missing a function or a method, you can also create them from a their type.
xml.Try: See that the caret is located under the handler identifier that is used as a function reference. Press ShowIntentionActions to invoke intention actions.
Select Create function 'handler' and press EditorEnter.
You can now adjust the parameters to your needs. Press EditorEscape to finish this lesson.
